str.name: Strength
str.desc: Measures the raw physical power your investigator can bring to bear.

con.name: Constitution
con.desc: Is a measure of the health andhardiness of your investigator.

pow.name: Power
pow.desc: Is a combination of force of will, spirit,and mental stability.

dex.name: Dexterity
dex.desc: Is a measure of your investigator's physical agility and speed.

app.name: Appearance
app.desc: Measures the physical appeal of your character.

siz.name: Size
siz.desc: Reflects your investigator's combined height and weight.

int.name: Intelligence
int.desc: Is a rough measure of your investigator's cunning and ability to make leaps of logic and intuition.

edu.name: Education
edu.desc: Is a measure of the knowledge that your investigator has accumulated through formal education, or the venerated _School of Hard Knocks._
